Class StoryCreationController.Publisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.controller.StoryCreationController.Publisher

    private class StoryCreationController.Publisher
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which is responsible for publishing stories using the ESClient.

    Alex

    • Method Detail

      • publishStory

        public void publishStory()
        Publishes the Story to the server.

      • checkSIDConflict

        private void checkSIDConflict(int SID)
        Checks if an SID already exists on the server. If there is a conflict, it is resolved by changing the SID of the current Story to a new SID.
        Parameters:
        SID - the SID being checked for

      • replaceSID

        private int replaceSID()
        Changes the SID of the current story to a new SID fetched from the server.
